hero.subtitle: Simplify data management, analysis, and collaboration with K7 Enterprise AI Assistant

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description1: At K7 Enterprise AI, we're dedicated to revolutionizing how businesses interact with their data.
aboutUs.description2: Our mission is to empower enterprises with cutting-edge AI solutions that drive informed decision-making and boost productivity.

items.title: Smart Document Processing
items.subTitle: Manage and Analyze Documents
items.description: Easily manage and analyze various document formats with AI-powered tools. Our system extracts key insights, generates summaries, and even performs sentiment analysis to help you quickly understand content. Streamline workflows by automating document organization and keyword extraction.

items.title: Intelligent Query Processing
items.subTitle: Seamless Database Integration
items.description: Our NLP-powered query processing allows users to interact with databases naturally. Convert plain language questions into accurate SQL queries, retrieve data seamlessly, and get instant results without deep technical knowledge.

items.title: Advanced Mathematical Computation
items.subTitle: Solve Equations with Ease
items.description: Solve complex equations, perform step-by-step derivations, and analyze mathematical problems effortlessly. Our AI-powered math assistant is designed to help students, researchers, and professionals tackle even the most challenging problems.

items.title: Table Data Manipulation & SQL Generation
items.subTitle: Work Smarter with Tables
items.description: Simplify tabular data processing with AI-driven tools. Perform quick transformations, filter data efficiently, and generate SQL queries for deeper insights. Ideal for professionals handling structured data and reports.

items.title: Interactive Data Visualization
items.subTitle: Transform Data into Insights
items.description: Transform raw data into meaningful insights with interactive charts and graphs. Our visualization tools provide real-time rendering, caching, and enhanced UI for seamless user experience.

items.title: Intelligent Data Sourcing
items.subTitle: Internal & Web Data Integration
items.description: Retrieve structured and unstructured data from internal sources and the web. Our AI ensures reliable data enrichment, allowing for deeper analysis and business intelligence applications.

items.title: Seamless Collaboration
items.subTitle: Built for Teams & Individuals
items.description: Designed for both teams and individuals, our platform enables real-time collaboration with role-based access, shared workflows, and seamless communication. Enhance productivity with AI-assisted teamwork.
